results.name: a(n) = binomial(bigOmega(n),omega(n)), where omega = A001221 and bigOmega = A001222.
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
mathematica: a[n_] := Binomial[PrimeOmega[n], PrimeNu[n]]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 100}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 29 2013 *)
